IS_EMAIL: {property} must be a valid email address
IS_PHONE_NUMBER: {property} must be a valid phone number
IS_ENUM: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints.0}
ARRAY_NOT_EMPTY: {property} should not be an empty array
IS_STRONG_PASSWORD: {property} must be a strong password, including uppercase, lowercase, digits, and special characters
MIN_LENGTH: {property} must be at least {constraints.0} characters long
MAX_LENGTH: {property} must be at most {constraints.0} characters long
IS_IN: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints.0}
IS_NOT_IN: {property} must not be one of the following values: {constraints.0}
IS_JSON: {property} must be a valid JSON string
IS_ALPHANUMERIC: {property} must contain only letters and numbers
IS_MILITARY_TIME: {property} must be in the format HH:MM (24h)
IS_BASE64: {property} must be a valid Base64 string
IS_CREDIT_CARD: {property} must be a valid credit card number
IS_HEX_COLOR: {property} must be a valid hex color
IS_BIC: {property} must be a valid BIC code
